page.title: 07Small businesses
page.content: An interesting development in this area has been the setting up of small businesses. There is now a rope maker and repairer who makes and repairs ropes for many churches in the country, and is currently engaged in work for St. Thomas', Salisbury, and Pershore Abbey. Not far from him we find a furniture designer and maker. In the small village of Munderfield there is an antique furniture business which was set up six months ago, and a gunsmith. This gunsmiths was started by a man from Birmingham with his two sons. While they sell and repair guns, his wife runs the village shop and post office. There is also a builder working in the village.
